Room.Name: Nyyron Trail
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the Nyyron trail, just north of the Hafnia Mountain Road.
Room.LongDescription: A small creek tumbles alongside the trail, making a very pleasant sound. The dirt path is wide enough for a wagon, but there are no wagon ruts in the path. However, you do see plenty of three-toed footprints which look exactly like troll prints. Only bigger. The trail disappears around a massive boulder to the northeast.
